item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 8, 2025 at 3:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Ty: A fast Python type checker and language server (578 points | 164 comments)

3. Waiting for Postgres 18: Accelerating Disk Reads with Asynchronous I/O (386 points | 99 comments)

28. How three years at McKinsey shaped my second startup (109 points | 133 comments)
29. WeightWatchers files bankruptcy (66 points | 234 comments)
30. Ghost students are creating problems for California colleges (62 points | 83 comments)
